import React,{useState} from 'react' const AddNewDivision = () => { const[data,setData] = useState({ divisionName:"", incharge:"", email:"", totalEmployee:"", }); const [record,setRecord] = useState(); const handleChange = (e) =>{ const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; setData({...data,[name]:value}) console.log(value) } const handleSubmit = () =>{ const newrecord = {...data, id: new Date().getTime().toString()} setRecord([...record,newrecord]) console.log(record) } return ( <>
Add New Division

Division Name

Incharge

Incharge E-mail ID

Total Employees Working

) } export default AddNewDivision
